00019 void NonmemTranslator::parseData()
00020 {
00021   SymbolTable * table = getSymbolTable();
00022 
00023   //
00024   // Precondition: The number of individuals has been determined.
00025   //
00026   if( getPopSize() <= 0 )
00027     {
00028       char m[ SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen() ];
00029       snprintf( m, 
00030         SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen(),
00031         "Programming error!  The population size must have been determined!" );
00032       throw SpkCompilerException( SpkCompilerError::ASPK_PROGRAMMER_ERR, m, __LINE__, __FILE__ );
00033     }
00034 
00035   //
00036   // Precondition: The type of analysis has been determined.
00037   //
00038   if( getTarget() != POP && getTarget() != IND )
00039     {
00040       char m[ SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen() ];
00041       snprintf( m, 
00042         SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen(),
00043         "Programming error!  The analysis type (individual/population) must have been determined!" );
00044       throw SpkCompilerException( SpkCompilerError::ASPK_PROGRAMMER_ERR, m, __LINE__, __FILE__ );
00045     }
00046 
00047   //
00048   // Precondition: The symbol table has no entry yet for data labels.
00049   //
00050   if( table->getLabels()->size() != 0 )
00051     {
00052       char m[ SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen() ];
00053       snprintf( m, 
00054         SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen(),
00055         "Programming error!  No labels should have been registered in the symbol table!" );
00056       throw SpkCompilerException( SpkCompilerError::ASPK_PROGRAMMER_ERR, m, __LINE__, __FILE__ );
00057      }
00058 
00059   valarray<int> N;
00060   DOMElement * spkdata = getDataTree()->getDocumentElement();
00061   assert( XMLString::equals( spkdata->getNodeName(), XML.X_SPKDATA ) );
00062   const XMLCh* version = spkdata->getAttribute( XML.X_VERSION );
00063 
00064   if( !XMLString::equals( version, XML.X_POINTONE ) )
00065     {
00066       char m[ SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen() ];
00067       snprintf( m, 
00068         SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen(),
00069         "Version %s is not supported yet!", version );
00070       throw SpkCompilerException( SpkCompilerError::ASPK_PROGRAMMER_ERR, m, __LINE__, __FILE__ );
00071      }
00072 
00073   //
00074   // Process through n number of <table>s, where n >= 0.
00075   // NOTE: For v0.1, n == 1.
00076   //
00077   DOMElement * spksource = dynamic_cast<DOMElement*>( getSourceTree()->getDocumentElement() );
00078 
00079   DOMNodeList * datasets = spkdata->getElementsByTagName( XML.X_TABLE );
00080   int nDataSets = datasets->getLength();
00081   if( nDataSets < 1 )
00082     {
00083       char m[ SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen() ];
00084       snprintf( m, 
00085         SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen(),
00086         "Missing a data set!" );
00087       throw SpkCompilerException( SpkCompilerError::ASPK_PROGRAMMER_ERR, m, __LINE__, __FILE__ );
00088     }
00089   if( nDataSets > 1 )
00090     {
00091       char m[ SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen() ];
00092       snprintf( m, 
00093         SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen(),
00094         "Multiple data sets not supported!" );
00095       throw SpkCompilerException( SpkCompilerError::ASPK_PROGRAMMER_ERR, m, __LINE__, __FILE__ );
00096     }
00097 
00098   int nSubjects = 0;
00099   for( int i=0; i<nDataSets; i++ )
00100     {
00101       DOMElement * dataset = dynamic_cast<DOMElement*>( datasets->item(i) );
00102 
00103       int  posID, posAMT, posMDV, posEVID;
00104       DOMNodeList * data_labels_list = spksource->getElementsByTagName( XML.X_DATA_LABELS );
00105       if( data_labels_list->getLength() < 1 )
00106       {
00107          throw SpkCompilerException( SpkCompilerError::ASPK_PROGRAMMER_ERR,
00108                                  "<data_labels> tag is missing in source.xml",
00109                      __LINE__, __FILE__ );
00110       }
00111       DOMNodeList * labels = dynamic_cast<DOMElement*>(data_labels_list->item(0))->getElementsByTagName( XML.X_LABEL );
00112       if( labels->getLength() < 1 )
00113       {
00114          throw SpkCompilerException( SpkCompilerError::ASPK_PROGRAMMER_ERR,
00115                                  "<label> tag is missing in source.xml",
00116                      __LINE__, __FILE__ );
00117       }
00118 
00119       removeDrop( dataset, labels );
00120       removeSkip( dataset, labels );
00121 
00122       bool isID   = ( ( posID   = whereis( labels, XML.X_ID )   ) >= 0 );
00123       bool isAMT  = ( ( posAMT  = whereis( labels, XML.X_AMT )  ) >= 0 );
00124       bool isMDV  = ( ( posMDV  = whereis( labels, XML.X_MDV )  ) >= 0 );
00125       bool isEVID = ( ( posEVID = whereis( labels, XML.X_EVID ) ) >= 0 );
00126 
00127       // Warning: Do not change the order of the following three insert calls.
00128 
00129       // If ID is missing, add it with a value = 1.
00130       if( !isID )
00131     {
00132       posID = insertID( dataset, labels );
00133 
00134           // Update the other label positions.
00135       isAMT  = ( ( posAMT  = whereis( labels, XML.X_AMT )  ) >= 0 );
00136       isMDV  = ( ( posMDV  = whereis( labels, XML.X_MDV )  ) >= 0 );
00137       isEVID = ( ( posEVID = whereis( labels, XML.X_EVID ) ) >= 0 );
00138     }
00139 
00140       // If MDV is missing, there are more than one way to determine the default value.
00141       // Follow the following logic:
00142       //
00143       //          Input                     Output
00144       // (-=missing, x=present)       (0=0, 1=1, x=as_is)
00145       // 
00146       //   AMT     MDV    EVID        AMT     MDV    EVID
00147       //    -       -       -          0       0       0
00148       //    -       -       x          0      EVID     x
00149       //    -       x       -          0       x      MDV
00150       //    -       x       x          0       x       x
00151       //    x       -       -          x      AMT     AMT
00152       //    x       -       x          x      EVID     x 
00153       //    x       x       -          x       x      MDV 
00154       //    x       x       x          x       x       x 
00155       // If AMT is missing, add it with a value = 0.0.
00156       if( !isAMT )
00157     {
00158       posAMT = insertAMT( dataset, labels );
00159 
00160           // Update the other label positions.
00161       isAMT  = ( ( posAMT  = whereis( labels, XML.X_AMT )  ) >= 0 );
00162       isMDV  = ( ( posMDV  = whereis( labels, XML.X_MDV )  ) >= 0 );
00163       isEVID = ( ( posEVID = whereis( labels, XML.X_EVID ) ) >= 0 );
00164     }
00165 
00166       if( !isMDV )
00167     {
00168       //
00169       // use EVID if EVID is present.
00170       //   MDV=0 if EVID=0
00171       //      =1 if EVID!=0
00172       // use AMT if EVID is not present and AMT is present
00173       //   AMT=0 -> MDV=0
00174       //      =1 -> MDV=1
00175       // fill with 0 if neither AMT or EVID is present
00176       //
00177       posMDV = insertMDV( dataset, labels, posAMT, posEVID );
00178 
00179           // Update the other label positions.
00180       isAMT  = ( ( posAMT  = whereis( labels, XML.X_AMT )  ) >= 0 );
00181       isMDV  = ( ( posMDV  = whereis( labels, XML.X_MDV )  ) >= 0 );
00182       isEVID = ( ( posEVID = whereis( labels, XML.X_EVID ) ) >= 0 );
00183     }
00184     if( !isEVID )
00185     {
00186       //
00187       // Insert the EVID field if the data set lacks the field.
00188       //
00189       // If MDV is given:
00190       //   EVID=MDV
00191       //
00192       // If AMT is given but not MDV:
00193       //   EVID=0 if AMT=0
00194       //       =1 if AMT>0
00195       // Fill with 0 if neighther AMT or MDV is given.
00196       //
00197       // Returns the location (>=0) in which the EVID field can be found.
00198       //         
00199       posEVID = insertEVID( dataset, labels, posAMT, posMDV );
00200 
00201       // Update the other label positions.
00202       isAMT  = ( ( posAMT  = whereis( labels, XML.X_AMT )  ) >= 0 );
00203       isMDV  = ( ( posMDV  = whereis( labels, XML.X_MDV )  ) >= 0 );
00204       isEVID = ( ( posEVID = whereis( labels, XML.X_EVID ) ) >= 0 );
00205     }
00206 
00207 
00208       unsigned int nFields;
00209       if( !dataset->hasAttribute( XML.X_COLUMNS ) )
00210     {
00211       char m[ SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen() ];
00212       snprintf( m, 
00213             SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen(),
00214             "Missing \"%s::%s\" attribute specification in data.xml!\n", XML.C_TABLE, XML.C_COLUMNS );
00215       throw SpkCompilerException( SpkCompilerError::ASPK_PROGRAMMER_ERR, m, __LINE__, __FILE__ );
00216     }     
00217       XMLString::textToBin( dataset->getAttribute( XML.X_COLUMNS ), nFields );
00218 
00219       unsigned int nRecords;
00220       if( !dataset->hasAttribute( XML.X_ROWS ) )
00221     {
00222       char m[ SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen() ];
00223       snprintf( m, 
00224             SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen(),
00225             "Missing \"%s::%s\" attribute specification in data.xml!\n", XML.C_TABLE, XML.C_ROWS );
00226       throw SpkCompilerException( SpkCompilerError::ASPK_PROGRAMMER_ERR, m, __LINE__, __FILE__ );
00227     } 
00228       XMLString::textToBin( dataset->getAttribute( XML.X_ROWS ), nRecords );
00229 
00230       if( nRecords == 0 )
00231       {
00232          // empty data set, skip to the next data set.
00233          // continue;
00234          // For ver 0.1, this is an error!
00235     char m[ SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen() ];
00236     snprintf( m, 
00237           SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen(),
00238           "Empty data set!" );
00239     SpkCompilerException e( SpkCompilerError::ASPK_USER_ERR, m, __LINE__, __FILE__ );
00240     throw e;
00241       }
00242 
00243       map< string, map<string, vector<string> > > tmp_values;
00244       vector<string> tmp_ids;
00245       vector<string> tmp_labels(nFields);
00246       vector<string> tmp_types (nFields);
00247 
00248       unsigned int pos;      
00249       DOMNodeList * rows = dataset->getElementsByTagName( XML.X_ROW );
00250       if( rows->getLength() != nRecords )
00251     {
00252       char m[ SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen() ];
00253       snprintf( m, 
00254             SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen(),
00255             "The number of &lt;row&gt;s does not match with the value of &lt;table::rows&gt; attribute!" );
00256       throw SpkCompilerException( SpkCompilerError::ASPK_PROGRAMMER_ERR, m, __LINE__, __FILE__ );
00257     }
00258 
00259       for( int j=0; j<nRecords; j++ )
00260     {
00261       DOMElement  * row    = dynamic_cast<DOMElement*>( rows->item(j) );
00262       if( !row->hasAttribute( XML.X_POSITION ) )
00263         {
00264           char m[ SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen() ];
00265           snprintf( m, 
00266             SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen(),
00267             "An attribute, %s, is missing from &lt;%s&gt; tag.", XML.X_POSITION, XML.X_ROW );
00268           throw SpkCompilerException( SpkCompilerError::ASPK_PROGRAMMER_ERR, m, __LINE__, __FILE__ );         
00269         }
00270       const XMLCh* xml_position = row->getAttribute( XML.X_POSITION );
00271       if( !XMLString::textToBin( xml_position, pos ) )
00272         {
00273           char m[ SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen() ];
00274           snprintf( m, 
00275             SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen(),
00276             "Failed to convert an alphanumeric value to an integer!" );
00277           throw SpkCompilerException( SpkCompilerError::ASPK_PROGRAMMER_ERR, m, __LINE__, __FILE__ );
00278         }
00279       DOMNodeList * values = row->getElementsByTagName( XML.X_VALUE );
00280       if( values->getLength() != nFields )
00281         {
00282           char m[ SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen() ];
00283           snprintf( m, 
00284             SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen(),
00285             "The number of &lt;%s&gt; elements does not match with the value of &lt;%s&gt; attribute!",
00286                XML.X_VALUE, XML.X_COLUMNS );
00287           throw SpkCompilerException( SpkCompilerError::ASPK_PROGRAMMER_ERR, m, __LINE__, __FILE__ );
00288         }
00289 
00290       //
00291       // At the first iteration, k=0, the value of *id is set and it is used for the
00292       // rest of iterations.
00293       //
00294       const XMLCh* xml_value = values->item(posID)->getFirstChild()->getNodeValue();
00295       XMLCh* xml_value_noWS = XMLString::replicate( xml_value );
00296       XMLString::removeWS( xml_value_noWS );
00297       char * id = XMLString::transcode( xml_value_noWS );
00298       for( int k=0; k<nFields; k++ )
00299         {
00300           //
00301           // The values in the first row (ie. position=1) are data labels.
00302           //
00303           if( pos==1 )
00304         {
00305           const XMLCh* xml_label = values->item(k)->getFirstChild()->getNodeValue();
00306           assert( xml_label != NULL );
00307           // At this point xml_label may contain white spaces.
00308           // Get rid of them!
00309           XMLCh* xml_label_noWS = XMLString::replicate( xml_label );
00310           XMLString::removeWS( xml_label_noWS );
00311                   char * delme = XMLString::transcode( xml_label_noWS );
00312           if( find( tmp_labels.begin(), tmp_labels.end(), string(delme) ) != tmp_labels.end() )
00313             {
00314               char m[ SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen() ];
00315               snprintf( m, 
00316                 SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen(),
00317                 "%s is already defined!", delme );
00318               throw SpkCompilerException( SpkCompilerError::ASPK_USER_ERR, m, __LINE__, __FILE__ );
00319             }
00320           tmp_labels[k] = string( delme );
00321                   delete delme;
00322           XMLString::release( &xml_label_noWS );
00323           continue;
00324         }
00325 
00326           const XMLCh* xml_type;
00327           if( dynamic_cast<DOMElement*>( values->item(k) )->hasAttribute( XML.X_TYPE ) )
00328         {
00329           xml_type = dynamic_cast<DOMElement*>( values->item(k) )->getAttribute( XML.X_TYPE );
00330         }
00331           else
00332         {
00333           xml_type = XML.X_NUMERIC;
00334         }
00335           //
00336           // The value types in the second row (ie. position=2) are used as reference
00337           // against which the value types in the subsequent rows will be compared.
00338           //
00339           if( pos==2 )
00340         {
00341           char * delme_c = XMLString::transcode(xml_type);
00342           string delme_s( delme_c );
00343           delete delme_c;
00344           tmp_types[k] = delme_s;
00345         }         
00346 
00347           //
00348           // For the subsequent rows (>2), the value types should match the entries in tmp_types[].
00349           //
00350           char * delme_c = XMLString::transcode( xml_type );
00351               string delme_s( delme_c );
00352           delete delme_c;
00353           assert( delme_s == tmp_types[k] );
00354           
00355           const XMLCh* xml_value = values->item(k)->getFirstChild()->getNodeValue();
00356           XMLCh* xml_value_noWS = XMLString::replicate( xml_value );
00357           XMLString::removeWS( xml_value_noWS );
00358 
00359               //
00360               // If this item is an ID, check if the value changed since the previous iteration.
00361               // If it does, increment the #of subjects and keep the new ID for future reference.
00362           //
00363           if( k == posID )
00364         {
00365           id = XMLString::transcode( xml_value_noWS );
00366           if( find( tmp_ids.begin(), tmp_ids.end(), id ) == tmp_ids.end() )
00367             {
00368               tmp_ids.push_back( id );
00369               ++nSubjects;
00370             }
00371         }
00372               //
00373               // If a data value is ".", that means 0.0.
00374               //
00375           char * c_value = 
00376                  ( XMLString::stringLen( xml_value )>0? XMLString::transcode( xml_value_noWS ) : NULL );
00377               if( strcmp( c_value, "." ) == 0 )
00378                  tmp_values[id][tmp_labels[k]].push_back( "0.0" );
00379               else
00380              tmp_values[id][tmp_labels[k]].push_back( string(c_value) );
00381           delete c_value;
00382           XMLString::release( &xml_value_noWS );          
00383         }
00384       delete id;
00385     }
00386       if( (nSubjects > 1) && (getTarget() == IND) )
00387         {
00388           throw SpkCompilerException( SpkCompilerError::ASPK_USER_ERR, 
00389                   "Individual analysis was requested with a population data set!", __LINE__, __FILE__ );
00390         }
00391 
00392       if( nSubjects != getPopSize())
00393         {
00394 
00395           char m[ SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen() ];
00396           snprintf( m, 
00397         SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen(),
00398         "The number of subjects in the data file (%d) did not match the number of unique IDs (%d)!\n", getPopSize(), nSubjects );
00399           throw SpkCompilerException( SpkCompilerError::ASPK_USER_ERR,m, __LINE__, __FILE__ );
00400         }
00401       
00402       if( nSubjects != tmp_ids.size() )
00403         {
00404           throw SpkCompilerException( SpkCompilerError::ASPK_USER_ERR, 
00405                   "The number of subjects in the data file did not match the expected number!nSubjects != tmp_ids.size()", __LINE__, __FILE__ );
00406         }
00407 
00408       N.resize( nSubjects );
00409 
00410 
00411       vector<string>::const_iterator pID = tmp_ids.begin();
00412       for( int k=0; pID != tmp_ids.end(), k<nSubjects; k++, pID++ )
00413     {
00414       N[k] = tmp_values[*pID][tmp_labels[0]].size();
00415     }
00416       
00417       //
00418       // Register the data labels without any attributes yet.
00419       //
00420       int nLabels = tmp_labels.size();
00421       for( int k=0; k<nLabels; k++ )
00422     {
00423       table->insertLabel( tmp_labels[k], "", N );  
00424     }
00425 
00426       // Store the data item values permanently.
00427       // A Symbol object for a label maintains three vectors: initial, upper and lower.
00428       // Use "initial" vector to store the data item values for the label. 
00429       //
00430       // label ---> initial[i] ---> data for the i-th individual's "label" data item.
00431       //
00432       int who=0;
00433       for( vector<string>::const_iterator pID = tmp_ids.begin(); pID != tmp_ids.end(); pID++, who++ )
00434     {
00435       for( int k=0; k<nLabels; k++ )
00436         {
00437           Symbol *s = table->find( tmp_labels[k] );
00438           vector<string>::const_iterator itr = (tmp_values[*pID][tmp_labels[k]]).begin();
00439           for( int l=0; itr != tmp_values[*pID][tmp_labels[k]].end(); l++, itr++ )
00440         {
00441           s->initial[who][l] = tmp_values[*pID][tmp_labels[k]][l];
00442         }
00443         }
00444     }
00445     }
00446 }
00447 /*
00448  * Remove data items labeled as DROP.  Returns the number of columns
00449  * that have been removed.
00450  */
00451 int NonmemTranslator::removeDrop( DOMElement * dataset, DOMNodeList * labels  )
00452 {
00453   int pos = -1;
00454   int nDropped = 0;
00455 
00456   DOMNodeList * data_labels_list;
00457 
00458   for( nDropped = 0; (pos = whereis( labels, XML.X_DROP )) >= 0; ++nDropped )
00459     {
00460       DOMNodeList * records  = dataset->getElementsByTagName( XML.X_ROW );
00461       
00462       for( int i=0; i<records->getLength(); i++ )
00463     {
00464       DOMNodeList * values = dynamic_cast<DOMElement*>(records->item(i))->getElementsByTagName( XML.X_VALUE );
00465       records->item(i)->removeChild( values->item(pos));
00466     }
00467 
00468       data_labels_list = getSourceTree()->getElementsByTagName( XML.X_DATA_LABELS );
00469       // Remove the DROP label from source.xml
00470       data_labels_list->item(0)->removeChild( labels->item(pos) );
00471       labels = dynamic_cast<DOMElement*>(data_labels_list->item(0))->getElementsByTagName( XML.X_LABEL );
00472     }
00473 
00474   unsigned int nOriginalItems = 0;
00475   char c_nAdjustedItems[ 56 ];
00476   if( !dataset->hasAttribute( XML.X_COLUMNS ) )
00477     {
00478       char m[ SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen() ];
00479       snprintf( m, 
00480         SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen(),
00481         "Missing \"%s::%s\" attribute specification in data.xml!\n", XML.C_TABLE, XML.C_COLUMNS );
00482       throw SpkCompilerException( SpkCompilerError::ASPK_PROGRAMMER_ERR, m, __LINE__, __FILE__ );
00483     }
00484   XMLString::textToBin( dataset->getAttribute( XML.X_COLUMNS ),
00485             nOriginalItems );
00486   snprintf( c_nAdjustedItems, 56, "%d", nOriginalItems-nDropped );
00487   dataset->setAttribute( XML.X_COLUMNS, XMLString::transcode( c_nAdjustedItems ) );
00488 
00489   return nOriginalItems-nDropped;
00490 }
00491 /*
00492  * Remove data items labeled as SKIP.  Returns the number of columns
00493  * that have been removed.
00494  */
00495 int NonmemTranslator::removeSkip( DOMElement * dataset, DOMNodeList * labels  )
00496 {
00497   int pos = -1;
00498   int nSkipped = 0;
00499 
00500   DOMNodeList * data_labels_list;
00501 
00502   for( nSkipped = 0; (pos = whereis( labels, XML.X_SKIP )) >= 0; ++nSkipped )
00503     {
00504       DOMNodeList * records  = dataset->getElementsByTagName( XML.X_ROW );
00505       
00506       for( int i=0; i<records->getLength(); i++ )
00507     {
00508       DOMNodeList * values = dynamic_cast<DOMElement*>(records->item(i))->getElementsByTagName( XML.X_VALUE );
00509       records->item(i)->removeChild( values->item(pos));
00510     }
00511 
00512       data_labels_list = getSourceTree()->getElementsByTagName( XML.X_DATA_LABELS );
00513       // Remove the SKIP label from source.xml
00514       data_labels_list->item(0)->removeChild( labels->item(pos) );
00515       labels = dynamic_cast<DOMElement*>(data_labels_list->item(0))->getElementsByTagName( XML.X_LABEL );
00516     }
00517   unsigned int nOriginalItems = 0;
00518   char c_nAdjustedItems[ 56 ];
00519   if( !dataset->hasAttribute( XML.X_COLUMNS ) )
00520     {
00521       char m[ SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen() ];
00522       snprintf( m, 
00523         SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen(),
00524         "Missing \"%s::%s\" attribute specification in data.xml!\n", XML.C_TABLE, XML.C_COLUMNS );
00525       throw SpkCompilerException( SpkCompilerError::ASPK_PROGRAMMER_ERR, m, __LINE__, __FILE__ );
00526     }
00527   XMLString::textToBin( dataset->getAttribute( XML.X_COLUMNS ),
00528             nOriginalItems );
00529   snprintf( c_nAdjustedItems, 56, "%d", nOriginalItems-nSkipped );
00530   dataset->setAttribute( XML.X_COLUMNS, XMLString::transcode( c_nAdjustedItems ) );
00531 
00532   return nOriginalItems-nSkipped;
00533 }
00534 
00535 /*
00536  * Look for a label/item.  If the label is found, return the position from the left (>=0).
00537  * If not found, return -1.
00538  */
00539 int NonmemTranslator::whereis( DOMNodeList * labels, const XMLCh* x_label ) const
00540 {
00541   int nLabels = labels->getLength();
00542   for( int i=0; i<nLabels; i++ )
00543     {
00544       const DOMElement* elem = dynamic_cast<DOMElement*>( labels->item(i) );
00545       if( !elem->hasAttribute( XML.X_NAME ) )
00546     {
00547       throw SpkCompilerException( SpkCompilerError::ASPK_PROGRAMMER_ERR,
00548                       "\"name\" attribute is missing in <label> tag",
00549                       __LINE__, __FILE__ );
00550     }
00551       const XMLCh* x_name = elem->getAttribute( XML.X_NAME );
00552       // If there's the label, return immediately.
00553       if( XMLString::compareIString( x_name, x_label ) == 0 )
00554     {
00555       // The ID field is found in the j-th column.
00556       return i;
00557     }
00558 
00559       if( elem->hasAttribute( XML.X_SYNONYM ) )
00560     {
00561       const XMLCh* x_synonym = elem->getAttribute( XML.X_SYNONYM );
00562       if( XMLString::compareIString( x_synonym, x_label ) == 0 )
00563         {
00564           // The ID field is found in the j-th column.
00565           return i;
00566         }
00567 
00568     }
00569     }
00570 
00571   return -1;
00572 }
00573 /*
00574  * Insert the ID field if the data set lacks the field.
00575  * Returns the location (>=0) in which the ID field can be found.
00576  */
00577 
00578 int NonmemTranslator::insertID( DOMElement * dataset, DOMNodeList * labels  )
00579 {
00580   // If ID is defined in the data set, don't need to do anything.
00581   const int posID = 0;
00582   assert( whereis( labels, XML.X_ID ) < 0 );
00583 
00584   DOMNodeList * records  = dataset->getElementsByTagName( XML.X_ROW );
00585   //
00586   // If the data set is a population data and lacks the ID field,
00587   // then every record should be assigned to a different ID.
00588   //
00589   unsigned int recordNum = 0;
00590   const XMLCh * x_id_val;
00591   char id[ 56 ];
00592   if( getTarget() == POP )
00593     {
00594       for( int i=0; i<records->getLength(); i++ )
00595     {
00596       const XMLCh * x_position = dynamic_cast<DOMElement*>(records->item(i))->getAttribute( XML.X_POSITION );
00597       XMLString::textToBin( x_position, recordNum );
00598       if( recordNum == 1 )
00599         {
00600           x_id_val = XML.X_ID;
00601         }
00602       else
00603         {
00604           snprintf( id, 56, "%d", recordNum-1 );
00605           x_id_val = XMLString::transcode( id );
00606         }
00607       DOMNodeList * values          = dynamic_cast<DOMElement*>(records->item(i))->getElementsByTagName( XML.X_VALUE );
00608       DOMNode     * firstValueNode  = values->item(0);
00609       DOMElement  * newValueNode    = getDataTree()->createElement( XML.X_VALUE );
00610       DOMText     * newTerminalNode = getDataTree()->createTextNode( x_id_val );
00611       newValueNode->appendChild( newTerminalNode );
00612       records->item(i)->insertBefore( newValueNode, firstValueNode );
00613     }
00614     }
00615   //
00616   // If the data set is an individual data set and lacks the ID field,
00617   // all the records belongs to a subject whose ID=1.
00618   //
00619   else // getTarget() == IND
00620     {
00621       const XMLCh* X_1 = XMLString::transcode( "1" );
00622       for( int i=0; i<records->getLength(); i++ )
00623     {
00624       const XMLCh * x_position = dynamic_cast<DOMElement*>(records->item(i))->getAttribute( XML.X_POSITION );
00625       XMLString::textToBin( x_position, recordNum );
00626       if( recordNum == 1 )
00627         {
00628           x_id_val = XML.X_ID;
00629         }
00630       else
00631         {
00632           x_id_val = X_1;
00633         }
00634       DOMNodeList * values          = dynamic_cast<DOMElement*>(records->item(i))->getElementsByTagName( XML.X_VALUE );
00635       DOMNode     * firstValueNode  = values->item(0);
00636       DOMElement  * newValueNode    = getDataTree()->createElement( XML.X_VALUE );
00637       DOMText     * newTerminalNode = getDataTree()->createTextNode( x_id_val );
00638       newValueNode->appendChild( newTerminalNode );
00639       records->item(i)->insertBefore( newValueNode, firstValueNode );
00640     }
00641     }
00642   
00643   unsigned int nItems = 0;
00644   char c_nItemsPlus1[ 56 ];
00645 
00646   if( !dataset->hasAttribute( XML.X_COLUMNS ) )
00647     {
00648       char m[ SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen() ];
00649       snprintf( m, 
00650         SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen(),
00651         "Missing \"%s::%s\" attribute specification in data.xml!\n", XML.C_TABLE, XML.C_COLUMNS );
00652       throw SpkCompilerException( SpkCompilerError::ASPK_PROGRAMMER_ERR, m, __LINE__, __FILE__ );
00653     }
00654   XMLString::textToBin( dataset->getAttribute( XML.X_COLUMNS ),
00655                 nItems );
00656   snprintf( c_nItemsPlus1, 56,"%d", nItems + 1 );
00657   dataset->setAttribute( XML.X_COLUMNS, XMLString::transcode( c_nItemsPlus1)  );
00658 
00659   // Insert "ID" as the first entry of <data_labels> list in source.xml
00660   DOMNodeList * data_labels     = getSourceTree()->getElementsByTagName( XML.X_DATA_LABELS );
00661   DOMNodeList * values          = dynamic_cast<DOMElement*>(data_labels->item(0))->getElementsByTagName( XML.X_LABEL );
00662   DOMNode     * firstValueNode  = values->item(0);
00663   DOMElement  * newValueNode    = getSourceTree()->createElement( XML.X_LABEL );
00664   newValueNode->setAttribute( XML.X_NAME, XML.X_ID );
00665   data_labels->item(0)->insertBefore( newValueNode, firstValueNode );
00666 
00667   // Update the label list
00668   DOMNodeList * data_labels_list = getSourceTree()->getElementsByTagName( XML.X_DATA_LABELS );
00669   labels = dynamic_cast<DOMElement*>(data_labels_list->item(0))->getElementsByTagName( XML.X_LABEL );
00670 
00671   return posID;
00672 }
00673 /*
00674  * Insert the AMT field if the data set lacks the field.
00675  *
00676  * AMT(i) = 0
00677  *
00678  * Returns the location (>=0) in which the AMT field can be found.
00679  */
00680 int NonmemTranslator::insertAMT( DOMElement * dataset, DOMNodeList * labels )
00681 {
00682   // If AMT is defined in the data set, don't need to do anything.
00683   assert( whereis( labels, XML.X_AMT ) < 0 );
00684 
00685   DOMNodeList * records  = dataset->getElementsByTagName( XML.X_ROW );
00686   unsigned int recordNum=0;
00687   const XMLCh* x_amt_val;
00688   const XMLCh* X_0 = XMLString::transcode( "0.0" );
00689   for( int i=0; i<records->getLength(); i++ )
00690     {
00691       const XMLCh * x_position = dynamic_cast<DOMElement*>(records->item(i))->getAttribute( XML.X_POSITION );
00692       XMLString::textToBin( x_position, recordNum );
00693       DOMNodeList * values     = dynamic_cast<DOMElement*>(records->item(i))->getElementsByTagName( XML.X_VALUE );
00694       if( recordNum == 1 )
00695     {
00696       x_amt_val = XML.X_AMT;
00697     }
00698       else
00699     {
00700       x_amt_val = X_0;
00701     }
00702 
00703       //  values  -> item(0)          
00704       //             <value>ID</value>
00705       //          -> item(1)
00706       //             <value>TIME</value>
00707       //          -> item(2)
00708       //             <value>DV</value>
00709       //          -> item(3)
00710       //             <value>AMT</value>
00711       DOMNode     * firstValueNode  = values->item(0);
00712       DOMElement  * newValueNode    = getDataTree()->createElement( XML.X_VALUE );
00713       DOMText     * newTerminalNode = getDataTree()->createTextNode( x_amt_val );
00714       newValueNode->appendChild( newTerminalNode );
00715       records->item(i)->appendChild( newValueNode );
00716     }
00717   
00718   unsigned int nItems = 0;
00719   char c_nItemsPlus1[ 56 ];
00720   if( !dataset->hasAttribute( XML.X_COLUMNS ) )
00721     {
00722       char m[ SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen() ];
00723       snprintf( m, 
00724         SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen(),
00725         "Missing \"%s::%s\" attribute specification in data.xml!\n", XML.C_TABLE, XML.C_COLUMNS );
00726       throw SpkCompilerException( SpkCompilerError::ASPK_PROGRAMMER_ERR, m, __LINE__, __FILE__ );
00727     }
00728   XMLString::textToBin( dataset->getAttribute( XML.X_COLUMNS ),
00729                 nItems );
00730   snprintf( c_nItemsPlus1, 56, "%d", nItems + 1 );
00731   dataset->setAttribute( XML.X_COLUMNS, XMLString::transcode( c_nItemsPlus1 )  );
00732 
00733   const int pos = nItems;
00734 
00735   // Insert "AMT" as the first entry of <data_labels> list in source.xml
00736   DOMNodeList * data_labels     = getSourceTree()->getElementsByTagName( XML.X_DATA_LABELS );
00737   DOMNodeList * values          = dynamic_cast<DOMElement*>(data_labels->item(0))->getElementsByTagName( XML.X_LABEL );
00738   DOMNode     * firstValueNode  = values->item(0);
00739   DOMElement  * newValueNode    = getSourceTree()->createElement( XML.X_LABEL );
00740   newValueNode->setAttribute( XML.X_NAME, XML.X_AMT );
00741   data_labels->item(0)->appendChild( newValueNode );
00742 
00743   // Update the label list
00744   DOMNodeList * data_labels_list = getSourceTree()->getElementsByTagName( XML.X_DATA_LABELS );
00745   labels = dynamic_cast<DOMElement*>(data_labels_list->item(0))->getElementsByTagName( XML.X_LABEL );
00746 
00747   return pos;
00748 }
00749 
00750 /*
00751  * Insert the MDV field if the data set lacks the field.
00752  *
00753  * Initialize MDV in the following way:
00754  *
00755  *  If EVID is given:
00756  *    MDV(i) = 0 if EVID(i) == 0
00757  *           = 1 if EVID(i) > 0
00758  *  When AMT is given but not EVID:
00759  *    MDV(i) = 0 for AMT(i) == 0
00760  *           = 1 for AMT(i) == 1
00761  *  No AMT, no EVID:
00762  *    MDV(i) = 0
00763  *
00764  * Returns the location (>=0) at which the MDV field is inserted.
00765  */
00766 int NonmemTranslator::insertMDV( DOMElement * dataset, DOMNodeList * labels, int posAMT, int posEVID )
00767 {
00768   assert( whereis( labels, XML.X_MDV ) < 0 );
00769 
00770   DOMNodeList * records  = dataset->getElementsByTagName( XML.X_ROW );
00771 
00772   unsigned int recordNum=0;
00773   const XMLCh* x_mdv_val;
00774   const XMLCh* X_0 = XMLString::transcode( "0" );
00775   const XMLCh* X_1 = XMLString::transcode( "1" );
00776   for( int i=0; i<records->getLength(); i++ )
00777     {
00778       const XMLCh * x_position = dynamic_cast<DOMElement*>(records->item(i))->getAttribute( XML.X_POSITION );
00779       XMLString::textToBin( x_position, recordNum );
00780       DOMNodeList * values     = dynamic_cast<DOMElement*>(records->item(i))->getElementsByTagName( XML.X_VALUE );
00781       if( recordNum == 1 )
00782     {
00783       x_mdv_val = XML.X_MDV;
00784     }
00785       else
00786     {
00787       if( posEVID >= 0 )
00788         {
00789           unsigned int evid = 0;
00790           // Converting the value of EVID on i-th record to an integer.
00791           XMLString::textToBin( dynamic_cast<DOMElement*>(values->item(posEVID))->getFirstChild()->getNodeValue(), evid );
00792           if( evid == 0 )
00793         x_mdv_val = X_0;
00794           else
00795         x_mdv_val = X_1;
00796         }
00797       else if( posAMT >= 0 )
00798         {
00799           const char *c_amt = XMLString::transcode( 
00800                      dynamic_cast<DOMElement*>(values->item(posAMT))->getFirstChild()->getNodeValue() );
00801               double amt = atof( c_amt );
00802           if( amt == 0.0 )
00803         x_mdv_val = X_0;
00804           else
00805         x_mdv_val = X_1;
00806         }
00807       else
00808         {
00809           x_mdv_val = X_0;
00810         }
00811     }
00812 
00813       //  values  -> item(0)          
00814       //             <value>ID</value>
00815       //          -> item(1)
00816       //             <value>TIME</value>
00817       //          -> item(2)
00818       //             <value>DV</value>
00819       //          -> item(3)
00820       //             <value>EVID</value>
00821       DOMNode     * firstValueNode  = values->item(0);
00822       DOMElement  * newValueNode    = getDataTree()->createElement( XML.X_VALUE );
00823       DOMText     * newTerminalNode = getDataTree()->createTextNode( x_mdv_val );
00824       newValueNode->appendChild( newTerminalNode );
00825       records->item(i)->appendChild( newValueNode );
00826     }
00827   
00828   unsigned int nItems = 0;
00829   char c_nItemsPlus1[ 56 ];
00830   if( !dataset->hasAttribute( XML.X_COLUMNS ) )
00831     {
00832       char m[ SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen() ];
00833       snprintf( m, 
00834         SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen(),
00835         "Missing \"%s::%s\" attribute specification in data.xml!\n", XML.C_TABLE, XML.C_COLUMNS );
00836       throw SpkCompilerException( SpkCompilerError::ASPK_PROGRAMMER_ERR, m, __LINE__, __FILE__ );
00837     }
00838   XMLString::textToBin( dataset->getAttribute( XML.X_COLUMNS ),
00839                 nItems );
00840   snprintf( c_nItemsPlus1, 56, "%d", nItems + 1 );
00841   dataset->setAttribute( XML.X_COLUMNS, XMLString::transcode( c_nItemsPlus1) );
00842 
00843   const int pos = nItems;
00844 
00845   // Insert "MDV" as the first entry of <data_labels> list in source.xml
00846   DOMNodeList * data_labels     = getSourceTree()->getElementsByTagName( XML.X_DATA_LABELS );
00847   DOMNodeList * values          = dynamic_cast<DOMElement*>(data_labels->item(0))->getElementsByTagName( XML.X_LABEL );
00848   DOMNode     * firstValueNode  = values->item(0);
00849   DOMElement  * newValueNode    = getSourceTree()->createElement( XML.X_LABEL );
00850   newValueNode->setAttribute( XML.X_NAME, XML.X_MDV );
00851   data_labels->item(0)->appendChild( newValueNode );
00852 
00853   // Update the label list
00854   DOMNodeList * data_labels_list = getSourceTree()->getElementsByTagName( XML.X_DATA_LABELS );
00855   labels = dynamic_cast<DOMElement*>(data_labels_list->item(0))->getElementsByTagName( XML.X_LABEL );
00856 
00857   return pos;
00858 }
00859 /*
00860  * Insert the EVID field if the data set lacks the field.
00861  *
00862  * If MDV is given:
00863  *   EVID=MDV
00864  *
00865  * If AMT is given but not MDV:
00866  *   EVID=0 if AMT=0
00867  *       =1 if AMT>0
00868  * Fill with 0 if neighther AMT or MDV is given.
00869  *
00870  * Returns the location (>=0) in which the EVID field can be found.
00871  */
00872 int NonmemTranslator::insertEVID( DOMElement * dataset, DOMNodeList * labels, int posAMT, int posMDV )
00873 {
00874   assert( whereis( labels, XML.X_EVID ) < 0 );
00875 
00876   DOMNodeList * records  = dataset->getElementsByTagName( XML.X_ROW );
00877   unsigned int recordNum=0;
00878   const XMLCh* x_evid_val;
00879   const XMLCh* X_0 = XMLString::transcode( "0" );
00880   const XMLCh* X_1 = XMLString::transcode( "1" );
00881   const XMLCh* X_2 = XMLString::transcode( "2" );
00882   for( int i=0; i<records->getLength(); i++ )
00883     {
00884       const XMLCh * x_position = dynamic_cast<DOMElement*>(records->item(i))->getAttribute( XML.X_POSITION );
00885       XMLString::textToBin( x_position, recordNum );
00886       DOMNodeList * values     = dynamic_cast<DOMElement*>(records->item(i))->getElementsByTagName( XML.X_VALUE );
00887       if( recordNum == 1 )
00888     {
00889       x_evid_val = XML.X_EVID;
00890     }
00891       else
00892     {
00893       if( posMDV >= 0 )
00894         {
00895           unsigned int mdv = 0;
00896           XMLString::textToBin( dynamic_cast<DOMElement*>(values->item(posMDV))->
00897                     getFirstChild()->getNodeValue(), mdv );
00898           if( mdv == 0 )
00899         {
00900           x_evid_val = X_0;
00901         }
00902           else // MDV = 1
00903         {
00904           if( posAMT >= 0 )
00905             {
00906               const char *c_amt = XMLString::transcode( 
00907                                    dynamic_cast<DOMElement*>(values->item(posAMT))->
00908                                    getFirstChild()->getNodeValue() );
00909               double amt = atof( c_amt );
00910               if( amt == 0 )
00911             {
00912               x_evid_val = X_2;
00913             }
00914               else
00915             {
00916               x_evid_val = X_1;
00917             }
00918             }
00919           else
00920             x_evid_val = X_1;
00921         }
00922         }
00923       else if( posAMT >= 0 )
00924         {
00925           const char *c_amt = XMLString::transcode( 
00926                      dynamic_cast<DOMElement*>(values->item(posAMT))->getFirstChild()->getNodeValue() );
00927               double amt = atof( c_amt );
00928           if( amt == 0.0 )
00929         x_evid_val = X_0;
00930           else
00931         x_evid_val = X_1;
00932         }
00933       else
00934         {
00935           x_evid_val = X_0;
00936         }
00937     }
00938 
00939       //  values  -> item(0)          
00940       //             <value>ID</value>
00941       //          -> item(1)
00942       //             <value>TIME</value>
00943       //          -> item(2)
00944       //             <value>DV</value>
00945       //          -> item(3)
00946       //             <value>MDV</value>
00947       DOMNode     * firstValueNode  = values->item(0);
00948       DOMElement  * newValueNode    = getDataTree()->createElement( XML.X_VALUE );
00949       DOMText     * newTerminalNode = getDataTree()->createTextNode( x_evid_val );
00950       newValueNode->appendChild( newTerminalNode );
00951       records->item(i)->appendChild( newValueNode );
00952     }
00953   
00954   unsigned int nItems = 0;
00955   char c_nItemsPlus1[ 56 ];
00956   if( !dataset->hasAttribute( XML.X_COLUMNS ) )
00957     {
00958       char m[ SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen() ];
00959       snprintf( m, 
00960         SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen(),
00961         "Missing \"%s::%s\" attribute specification in data.xml!\n", XML.C_TABLE, XML.C_COLUMNS );
00962       throw SpkCompilerException( SpkCompilerError::ASPK_PROGRAMMER_ERR, m, __LINE__, __FILE__ );
00963     }
00964   XMLString::textToBin( dataset->getAttribute( XML.X_COLUMNS ),
00965                 nItems );
00966   snprintf( c_nItemsPlus1, 56, "%d", nItems + 1 );
00967   dataset->setAttribute( XML.X_COLUMNS, XMLString::transcode( c_nItemsPlus1 )  );
00968 
00969   const int pos = nItems;
00970 
00971   // Insert "EVID" as the first entry of <data_labels> list in source.xml
00972   DOMNodeList * data_labels     = getSourceTree()->getElementsByTagName( XML.X_DATA_LABELS );
00973   DOMNodeList * values          = dynamic_cast<DOMElement*>(data_labels->item(0))->getElementsByTagName( XML.X_LABEL );
00974   DOMNode     * firstValueNode  = values->item(0);
00975   DOMElement  * newValueNode    = getSourceTree()->createElement( XML.X_LABEL );
00976   newValueNode->setAttribute( XML.X_NAME, XML.X_EVID );
00977   data_labels->item(0)->appendChild( newValueNode );
00978 
00979   // Update the label list
00980   DOMNodeList * data_labels_list = getSourceTree()->getElementsByTagName( XML.X_DATA_LABELS );
00981   labels = dynamic_cast<DOMElement*>(data_labels_list->item(0))->getElementsByTagName( XML.X_LABEL );
00982 
00983   return pos;
00984 }
